reviewText: I think part of why I like this movie is that I myself am a vet, and the system kinda screwed me over too.

reviewText: I love this move, Tommy lee Jones is great in this movie. This is a movie that must come out for DVD in the near future. In the 80's it was HBO biggest movie.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: I absolutley love this movie and I have been waiting for no less then 15 years for this movie to come out of moritorium, and finally it did, at least for download rental, but the fact that it is available is a plus, dvd disc is just around the corner, next.  The movie is quick and has few known cast memebers, however the plot is cool and the message is good, the acting well, this was initially a HBO special in the late 80's so it is fair,  I would definitley recommend this movie if you like guns, bullets and a short but to the point plot about veterans, don't expect Oscar acting, but it is enjoyable never the less.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: I watched this movie because of all the five star reviews, not knowing what to expect but hoping for a good movie. I thought the movie was unbelievable for one thing. I thought the acting was poor, seemed like the actors were having a hard time believing people would buy the plot. The movie seemed to lack substance meaning the characters were shallow and the plot too simple and lacking diversity. I was very disappointed and this reinforces the fact that even with a lot of great reviews a movie can still be terrible. This makes me wonder, who wrote all these five star reviews?
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: while not his best tommy lee jones is good as a nam vet who takes over for his dead friend and takes over central park to highlight how wrong vets are being done. the set up and the taking of the park are all handled very well and the story holds up very well when it could have easyly fallen apart. this was first made for hbo in the 80's and really needs to be on dvd.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: This is not a high dollar movie, but it was pretty good. Still plays the veteran gets weird after the Vietnam War, but it does tell his side of the story some. Does not paint the picture that it was all the wars fault or the Vet's fault, but that Government will overstep its bounds sometimes, and also that when a man/s family abandons him, then things happen. I liked it more for the plan, weaponry, and shows the true nature of some politicians.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: I had read this book several years before the movie came out.  I expected to like the movie no matter who starred in it but Tommy Lee Jones made it better than the movie deserved to be.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: I choose this rating because its a show that says something it makes a statement, about society than and now, people have to learn how to stand up for things they believe in, and the material they used hit the nail on the hammer with the hammer. Especially people in government who have no clue about the people they represent, they didn't care back than and the don't care now. Its the way government evades everything thats important to the people and have their own agenda's, so in the movie he holds the city hostage makes people think and thats a start unfortunately he had to do it at gun point. But sometimes that may be needed in the future.  Thanks Mike
summary: Making a Statement of the treatment of others
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: This totally underrated movie was here and gone in what seemed like less than a minute and was lost in the heap of "Rambo"esque movies that were released, but this one was definitely better than average.I can't remember the last time I saw a VHS copy of this film and it's been AGES since it was even on tv, but I'm still holding out hope that it will one day make it into DVD format.If you haven't seen it and you like those 'ticked-off Viet Nam vet' movies, pick this one up...if you can find it.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS

reviewText: It is a B flick b tommy. Lee Jones is great.  This should be on DVD.  Nice shots of central park.
Title: The Park Is Mine VHS
